video.title: Surface
video.synopsis: When an unsuspecting boy brings a mysterious sea creature ashore, he's shocked to learn he's discovered a new species that could change the world.

episodes.synopsis: A scientist encounters a weird sea creature, and a kid discovers a strange egg on the beach. What's the connection, and what does the government know?
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Oceanographer Laura Daughtery and fisherman Rich Connelly team up to investigate an unidentified carcass on the shores of Sullivan Island.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Government researchers suspect the creatures are causing global warming by digging into the ocean floor, and sightings of the creatures spark panic.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Laura enlists an ex-boyfriend to help her track one of the creatures, and Cirko testifies before the Pentagon about the dangers they pose.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting that something is awry in the neighborhood, animal control pays a visit to Miles and his buddy Phil when a local dog goes missing.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: After Cirko tells Lee that he's discovered the origin of the creatures while researching a rare sea orchid, he's run down by a car and left for dead.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Lee informs his superiors of Cirko's breakthrough and explains his reasons for having him assassinated. Miles tries to release Nim into the ocean.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Laura and Rich descend in a submersible they've built with Jackson's help and discover one of the creatures' spawning sites.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When Miles learns that a dockworker was the victim of a vicious attack, he fears the worst and enlists Phil's help to find the missing Nim.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Miles falls mysteriously ill, and his sister, Savannah, suspects his condition is the result of a bite he received from Nimrod.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Laura and Rich elude Lee's henchmen and try to find a news outlet to air the footage of the creature they captured on their dive.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: While on the run from Lee and his cohorts, Laura receives a mysterious email from someone claiming to have crucial information about the creatures.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The search for answers about the origins of the deadly creatures leads Laura and Rich to a secret laboratory, where they make a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Threatened by a school bully, Miles launches a ferocious retaliation, causing the townspeople to call for his arrest.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Laura races to save Rich when she learns he's being held in an underground facility after trespassing at a mysterious laboratory.
episodes.title: Episode 15
